text: May will be out this week. If Cameron had not put in Fixed Term Act, she would have been gone weeks ago.
author: johngizzi

text: ...they gave an extension if Commons approves May 's plan, and it's questionable whether it can be voted on a 3rd time.
author: johngizzi

text: Brexit will be just fine. UK can now negotiate it's own treaties unilaterally. It would help if you had a PM who believed in BREXIT.
author: johngizzi

text: As Aslin the Lion put it, "what is done is done." There was a vote on Brexit & no need to have another
author: johngizzi

text: Just as Winston Smith's friend recalled days before Big Brother came to power in Oceania & "men who wore top hats," older Brits remembered UK before EU was in picture & voted overwhelmingly for Brexit.
author: johngizzi

text: #PeoplesVoteMarch should just relax & get ready for 3/29it-it will be just like the Y2K scare....lot of hype, lot of jittery nerves & in the end. clocks changed & we carried on
author: johngizzi

text: If those 1 M people marching for a new vote on Brexit today had only bothered to vote in '16, they wouldn't need to March today.
author: johngizzi

text: Yesterday, sis-in-law @AnneHouseQuinn informed me, was the 80th anniversary of Kate Smith's stirring rendition of "God Bless America" on nationwide radio-'a moment powerfully recreated in "This is the Army," w. Ronald Reagan, George Murphy, Joan Leslie, & Irving Berlin.
author: johngizzi

text: notary sojac
author: johngizzi

text: Oops! I was so excited about interviewing ex-Sen. James Buckley at his home in Bethesda, MD I misstated his state & party designation. He's ex- Sen. James Buckley, C-(for Conservative Party)-R, NY, the only person to win a Senate seat as a third party candidate since 1930.
author: johngizzi

text: Absolutely delightful morning interviewing ex-Sen. James L. Buckley, R-MD, at his home in Bethesda, MD. At 96, he's razor sharp.
author: johngizzi

text: Mulvaney to Be Named Permanent Chief of Staff Soon https://www.newsmax.com/john-gizzi/mick-mulvaney-chief-of-staff-ross-vought-omb/2019/03/21/id/908025/ … #Newsmax via @Newsmax
author: johngizzi

text: I can picture @KellyannePolls & George leaving the house in the morning & tapping their noses as Robt. Redford & Paul Newman did in "The Sting."
author: johngizzi

text: I ve known them both since before they were married and, if nothing, they are clever. I can see the post- Administration memoir, "Split Assets."
author: johngizzi

text: I find it all amusing. I truly believe @KellyannePolls & George have cooked up a "schtick" to be this generation's @JamesCarville & Mary Matlin--& when Trump Administration is over, they fill-in Liberace's immortal words--"cry all the way to the bank!"
author: johngizzi

text: WHAT  MAKES KARV COMMUNICATIONS TICK?--Taking on Saudi Arabia and MBS at $120,000 a month to improve their post-Khashoggi image.
author: johngizzi

text: With my friend, TV producer & screen writer David Alan Johnson, today. Was w. David, brother Gary & their parents (the day O.J. Simpson was acquitted) on '94 on the set of his shortlived series "The Monroes"). Watched Wm. Devane play patriarch of a political family.
author: johngizzi

text: So enjoyed "Doyle Against the House" on the "Dick Powell Theatre," which included a rare (& powerful) dramatic appearance by Milton Berle, I watched it again.  Made in 1961, it holds up well.  Jan Sterling is outstanding as hatcheck girl & girlfriend of card dealer Eddie Doyle
author: johngizzi

text: Where is Millan Hupp?  Inquiring minds want to know.
author: johngizzi

text: @tqhoulton HI, TYLER...WILL YOU EMAIL ME AT gizzi.john@gmail.com?
author: johngizzi

text: New Chairman Vows NY Conservative Party Will Be Greater Force https://www.newsmax.com/john-gizzi/conservativeparty-kassar-long-buckley/2019/03/19/id/907756/ … #Newsmax via @Newsmax
author: johngizzi

text: New Chairman Vows NY Conservative Party Will Be Greater Force https://www.newsmax.com/john-gizzi/conservativeparty-kassar-long-buckley/2019/03/19/id/907756/ … #Newsmax via @Newsmax
author: johngizzi

text: FDR told the young (11) Roy Cohn opposition to his court-packing plan was based on "moss-covered ideas of old men versus the ideals of youth."
author: johngizzi

text: In denouncing Democratic calls for enlarging Supreme Ct, he broke w. late mentor Roy Cohn--who, as an 11yr-old, accompanied his parents to Oval Office & told FDR the policy of his he liked most was the plan to enlarge the high court.
author: johngizzi

text: Trump dismisses "courtpacking" backed by Dems to add more justices to the Supreme Ct--"They just want to catch up & it won't happen for six years." Why didn't he refer to FDR'S highly unpopular attempt to do do the same thing in 1937.
author: johngizzi

text: "We have discussed  Brazil becoming an ally, such as [those] in NATO," Borsonaro says.
author: johngizzi

text: Prez. Borsonaro of Brazil speaks of his admiration for @realDonaldTrump & denounces "political correctness" &  fake news." Strong medicine, a right, & from a foreign leader.
author: johngizzi

text: Brazilian Pres. & @realDonaldTrump in White House Rose Garden
author: johngizzi

text: In WH, waiting for @realDonaldTrump & Brazil's Pres. Borsonaro.
author: johngizzi

text: Altho Milton Berle dominated "Doyle Against the House," Gavin MacLeod turned in a stellar performance as "Arnie the Geek"a dealer in a mob-run casino who was caught dealing to a front man & had his fingers broken &, a fellow dealer said, "they played 'Yankee Doodle' on his head."
author: johngizzi

text: Still moved by "Doyle Against the House" & how Milton Berle--comedian & vaudevillean--turned in a gripping performance as Eddie Doyle, dealer in a mob-run gambling joint, who deals to a "front man" to get $ he needs for his 7-yr-old daughter's operation to overcome polio.
author: johngizzi

text: Watching the epic & heart-wrenching TV play "Doyle Against the House," from the "Dick Powell Theatre," in which Milton Berle showed the world he was a superb dramatic a tor & not just a comedian & variety show host.
author: johngizzi

text: Dems Could Pick Up 2 GOP Houses Seats in NC Special Elections https://www.newsmax.com/john-gizzi/north-carolina-walter-jones-mark-harris-mccready/2019/03/18/id/907475/ … #Newsmax via @Newsmax
author: johngizzi

text: If I could have any wish granted in 2019, it would be an audience with Pope Benedict XVI and the opportunity to thank him for Summorum Pontificum, which changed my life for the better.
author: johngizzi

text: Regarding the woman who got mauled at the Arizona zoo trying to win take a selfie w. a jaguar--it was a clear case of invasion of privacy & I'm inclined to be on the jaguar's side.
author: johngizzi

text: A wonderful & magical weekend celebrating the birthday of one who made the song in my heart a Gold Record winner & makes the life we have together invaluable--SW (Smarter Wife).
author: johngizzi

text: You're darn right I will pray for a complete recovery for Daniel Cardinal DiNardo. named archbishop Galveston-Houston of Pope Benedict XVI. When I consider who'd get to name another member of the College Cardinals if something happened to DiNardo, I'll pray extra-hard!
author: johngizzi
